definition: where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
(emphatic sentence-final particle, used instead of 啊[a5] after a word ending in "n")
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)

sentences.english: When and where to quicken the play is the key.
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏，何時打快是關鍵。

sentences.english: Where do you think this user would look for a cue?
sentences.chinese: 那麼你認爲他會在哪裏找這些線索呢？

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州學英語哪裏去？沃爾得國際英語你的最好選擇。

sentences.english: I can't call to mind where I met you.
sentences.chinese: 我記不起來在哪裏曾遇到過你。

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: OK. Thank you. Where should I buy them?
sentences.chinese: 好的，謝謝你。我在哪裏買藥？

sentences.english: Where was the device that connected charge and magnetic flux?
sentences.chinese: 連接電荷和磁通量的元件在哪裏？

sentences.english: A:Arlene,what is the most besutiful place around the coutry in spring?
sentences.chinese: 艾蓮，春天這個國家最漂亮的地方是哪裏？

sentences.english: I can't see where you comin' from.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你們從哪裏來的。

sentences.english: Where has religion taken shelter after Krsna has retired to His own abode?
sentences.chinese: 當奎師那離開回到祂自己的居所後宗教到哪裏去託庇？

sentences.english: Can you choose where you focus your attention?
sentences.chinese: 你能決定你的注意力放在哪裏嗎？

definition: there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
